channel.title: [ADVICE]My First Complete Model!(Sword)[ADVICE]
channel.description:
I know there's a billion swords out there, but I quite like the way this one turned out. It's the first model I've ever completed, yet it is still not *done.* I mean complete as -[b] making it whole, 3d, and okay-looking [/b] -
Here are some pics: [b][size=20pt]V1[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/m83a6c.jpg[/img] [size=20pt][b]V2[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2n9lhd.jpg[/img] [b][size=20pt]V3[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/f2kew2.jpg[/img] [size=20pt][b]V3-2R[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zd9j60.jpg[/img] Okay, can someone tell me what is wrong with the rendered version? It's like the datmaker view of it... The blade has a triangle that's messed up, and the hilt is iffy. Any solutions?
I'm not sure if I colored it right to everyone's specs, but... Here it is. And, I need to ask a question. I recolored the hilt, and it still hints at the red that it once was... If you look closely, you can see it. Anyone help me with this problem?
I consider this my [b]REAL[/b] first model, since the other one didn't really count :P
So, comment about it, tell me how to improve. Some key things I am looking for are some tips to make the modelling a bit quicker... As well as making the sword a little less fake-looking. Alos, when I put it in datmaker, it says I have lines. I checked metas, and it confirms that Ihave 2 lines. Can anyone tell me how to find them? Thank you :)

item.title: [ADVICE]My First Complete Model!(Sword)[ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @Hellman1 Hellman1
item.description:
@Hellman1 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:23, topic:268102”][quote author=Hellman1 link=topic=353880.msg2791371#msg2791371 date=1242785929]

Each Version is just a recolor lol.

Yes, because people kept telling me to change the colors lol.

(And wow… I leave for a couple months and come back to see that my post is still here Almost makes me want to start modelling again.)
[/quote]
umm… duh its still here… they dont delete custom made items… only recolors that aint worth it[/quote]

Here as in not dropped off the 50th page, or at least on its way. I suppose it’s my own fault for not writing an extra paragraph explaining my usage of the word “here.”

Read full topic

item.title: [ADVICE]My First Complete Model!(Sword)[ADVICE]
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

I'm not sure if I colored it right to everyone's specs, but... Here it is. And, I need to ask a question. I recolored the hilt, and it still hints at the red that it once was... If you look closely, you can see it. Anyone help me with this problem?

Uh if you still see hints of red… try going to your mat palete and click on that red and changing it to the colour you want.

Read full topic

ya rotate 90* then move it up

(make sure u select ALL of the blade)
